Title: i
Writer: A.N. Balakrishnan (dialogue), Swanand Kirkire (hindi dialogue), S. Shankar (story and screenplay), D. Suresh (dialogue)
Actors: Vikram, Amy Jackson, Suresh Gopi, Upen Patel
Plot: A simple body builder's(vikram) life took a unexpected turn when he became a model by his crush (amy) . When 5 men made his life 'better from hell' then story goes on by how a disabled man took revenge from them in a very Gore ways.
